subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Families and Family Life
Tennis
Parenting
lead_paragraph: Several players on the men’s and women’s tennis tours have or once had a parent as a coach, including the singles semifinalists Maria Sharapova, Sabine Lisicki, and Andy Murray.
snippet: Several players on the men’s and women’s tennis tours have or once had a parent as a coach, including the singles semifinalists Maria Sharapova, Sabine Lisicki, and Andy Murray.
